Text:
is this torrent for sleeping or for listening during an activity?
Your title and description don't match.

This torrent is for downloading audio file intended to enhance sleeping brain wave activity. I've used it regularly since the eighties. It works fine for me, makes it easier to meditate or just take a nap while travelling or at bedtime. The description covers the whole series, you may want to try e.g.
